definition: to flee/flight (from danger)/fugitive
to escape/to run away/to flee
to die/to lose/to be gone/to flee/deceased
runaway

sentences.english: The soldiers began to search the houses round about, and to pursue the fugitives .
sentences.chinese: 士兵們開始搜查四周的房屋並追捕逃亡者。

sentences.english: The fugitives could not have taken this as an encouraging sign.
sentences.chinese: 這些逃亡者並沒有被看作是鼓舞士氣的事件。

sentences.english: Chrysanthemum princess is forced to taking imperial jade seal, abscond everywhere.
sentences.chinese: 菊花公主被迫帶着玉璽，四處逃亡。

sentences.english: Crape myrtle in exile, head injury and blindness.
sentences.chinese: 紫薇在逃亡中，頭部受創而失明。

sentences.english: Many residents were fleeing to the South Korean port of Incheon.
sentences.chinese: 很多居民逃亡到韓國的仁川港。

sentences.english: The fugitive is believed to be headed for the Canadian border.
sentences.chinese: 據信，逃亡者正向加拿大邊界方向逃竄。

sentences.english: Shortly after he achieved freedom he became a member of an organization that assisted fugitive slaves.
sentences.chinese: 亨森獲得自由後不久就一心幫助逃亡奴隸。

sentences.english: The Great Migration after the First World War can be regarded as the escape from the miserable life in the South.
sentences.chinese: 一戰後的大移民是黑人爲逃避南方悲慘生活的大逃亡。

sentences.english: In absconding more by accident Japanese girl Beijing child cast fall the sea, beijing child oath signs up for this enemy.
sentences.chinese: 逃亡中更誤將日本少女京子拋落海，京子誓報此仇。

sentences.english: Jack escapes to Italy after the opening ambush in Sweden.
sentences.chinese: 在瑞典的露天伏擊之後，傑克逃亡到了意大利。

sentences.english: The police scoured the country for the fugitive.
sentences.chinese: 公安機關在全國搜索逃亡者。

sentences.english: Thus fear urges our flight, and desire animates our progress. (No. 47)
sentences.chinese: “恐懼”促使人們逃亡，“慾望”鼓勵人們冒險。

sentences.english: In Iraq, Christians are fleeing in droves.
sentences.chinese: 在伊拉克，基督徒大量逃亡。

sentences.english: The fugitives travelled by night andrested by day .
The social economy of the later Wu-Zhou Dynasty was seriously shocked by many households' escape.
sentences.chinese: 武周後期戶口大量逃亡，對社會經濟帶來很大的衝擊。

sentences.english: The few who survived the Houthi counter-attack are said to have deserted.
sentences.chinese: 據說少量在那場侯賽斯反擊中存活下來的士兵逃亡了。

definition: to run away/to go into exile
to force into exile/to be exiled/in exile
to run away from trouble/to flee from calamity/to be a refugee
to flee/to go into exile (from prison)
to run away to/to flee
to chase to kill
to flee from sth/to run away/to escape
to run away/to flee in disarray
in a panic/flurried
to flee in disorder/defeated and in rout
to run out/to escape
to flee/to run away
to flee abroad/to run away/to desert/outflow
refuge/to take refuge/to seek asylum (political etc)
to pursue/to be after/to hunt down
to escape/to flee/to run away
